review_body: This app seems like it will be really helpful for pride as all events going on are displayed clearly and the timetable for acts on the different stages is nicely laid out. Something I think would be a good addition is a feature where you can make your own itinerary of each act that you want to see s...Full ReviewThis app seems like it will be really helpful for pride as all events going on are displayed clearly and the timetable for acts on the different stages is nicely laid out. Something I think would be a good addition is a feature where you can make your own itinerary of each act that you want to see so it is clearly set out where and when the things that interest you most are. Possibly an add button by each performance so you can attach it to your itinerary easily.
This was a very useful app for navigating the activities of an awesome Pride weekend.
Great App for London Pride 2019 Jubilee
An indispensable guide for the day!
I didn't feel the love as was promised.
Great app especially for festival events!
Fails to open once installed on Huawei p7. Now its working once opened via email link.

Its got potential but clearly not actually been used by real users. All five stars appear to be forced with nothing to say. I need two things from this app and it failed on both: the ability to see parade route and current events.. route map is the same Google map i have in phone with just events fo...Full ReviewIts got potential but clearly not actually been used by real users. All five stars appear to be forced with nothing to say. I need two things from this app and it failed on both: the ability to see parade route and current events.. route map is the same Google map i have in phone with just events for around. There's no way to filter the events down to currently active or the day itself. The app clearly had passionate team behind it but nobody thought of using it as a user on the day.
Fabulous and helpful app to know what's happening and live Pride in london to the fullest !!
Easy to read, use, and very clear. Love it!
